src:
Live Streaming Real Madrid vs Galatasaray di Vidio
06 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid punya rekor kandang sempurna melawan Galatasaray. Los Blancos tentu ingin mempertahankannya. Di lain pihak, Galatasaray harus mematahkan rekor negatif di Bernabeu jika ingin menjaga kans lolos ke babak 16 besar.
Real Madrid akan menjamu Galatasaray di Santiago Bernabeu pada matchday 4 Grup A Liga Champions 2019/20, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Madrid sempat melalui dua laga pertamanya di grup ini tanpa kemenangan. Madrid kalah 0-3 di markas PSG, kemudian ditahan Club Brugge 2-2. Namun, kemenangan 1-0 di kandang Galatasaray lewat gol tunggal Toni Kroos pada matchday 3 telah menghidupkan peluang pasukan Zinedine Zidane untuk lolos ke babak berikutnya.
Madrid saat ini memiliki 4 poin di peringkat 2, tertinggal 5 poin dari PSG dan unggul 2 poin atas Club Brugge di peringkat 3. Sementara itu, Galatasaray baru memiliki 1 poin di posisi terbawah.
Madrid memenangi ketiga laga kandang sebelumnya melawan Galatasaray, yakni dua kali dengan skor 3-0 dan sekali dengan skor 4-1. Madrid bisa berada di posisi yang bagus untuk lolos jika mampu meneruskan tren tersebut.
Bagi Galatasaray, ini adalah partai yang sangat krusial. Kalah, maka jalan wakil Turki itu ke babak 16 besar akan tertutup rapat.

Simak live streaming Real Madrid vs Galatasaray di bawah ini.
text:
Live Streaming Real Madrid vs Galatasaray in Video
Nov 6 2019, 22:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Real Madrid have a perfect home record against Galatasaray. Los Blancos certainly want to maintain it. On the other hand, Galatasaray must break the negative record at the Bernabeu if he wants to keep the chance of qualifying for the round of 16.
Real Madrid will host Galatasaray at the Santiago Bernabeu on Matchday 4 Group A Champions League 2019/20, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Madrid had through the first two games in this group without a win. Madrid lost 0-3 at PSG headquarters, then were held by Club Brugge 2-2. However, a 1-0 victory at home to Galatasaray through a single goal by Toni Kroos on Matchday 3 has brought Zinedine Zidane's chances to the next round.
Madrid currently has 4 points in rank 2, 5 points behind PSG and 2 points ahead of Club Brugge in rank 3. Meanwhile, Galatasaray has only 1 point at the bottom.
Madrid won the previous three home games against Galatasaray, namely twice with a score of 3-0 and once with a score of 4-1. Madrid can be in a good position to qualify if it is able to continue the trend.
For Galatasaray, this is a very crucial party. Defeated, then the Turkish representative's path to the round of 16 will be tightly closed.

Check out Real Madrid vs Galatasaray's live streaming below.
